list.title: server
list.describe: NodeJs, use express mock data api.

list.title: JsRender
list.describe: JsRender is a light-weight but powerful templating engine, highly extensible, and optimized for high-performance rendering, without DOM dependency. It is designed for use in the browser or on Node.js, with or without jQuery.

list.title: Handlebars
list.describe: Handlebars provides the power necessary to let you build semantic templates effectively with no frustration. Handlebars is largely compatible with Mustache templates. In most cases it is possible to swap out Mustache with Handlebars and continue using your current templates.

list.title: es5-shim
list.describe: ECMAScript 5 compatibility shims for legacy (and modern) JavaScript engines.

list.title: webpack
list.describe: webpack is a module bundler. Its main purpose is to bundle JavaScript files for usage in a browser, yet it is also capable of transforming, bundling, or packaging just about any resource or asset.
